titleStmt.title: Paul's Church-yard. Libri theologici, politici, historici, nundinus Paulinis (unà cum templo) prostant venales. Juxta seriem alphabeti democratici. / Done into English for the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Birkenhead, John, Sir, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: Caption title; sig B4 has caption title: 'Pauls Churchyard libri, theologici, politici, historici, nundinis Paulinus (unà cum Templo) prostant venales, &c. Centuria secunda.'.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
